body:
*Changes to Google Play release 1.4.3*
- Show error codes in notification for easier debugging
- Numerous small fixes
- New icon design
- Show half-year grades
- Support grade types other than regular (very basic)
- Added simple statistics to absences

Changes to Google Play release 1.3.17

- Smaller improvements (the only change to release 1.4.3)
- Added initial support for showing absences
- Simplified and joint login interface
- Username / password is not stored anymore
- Added icons in settings to improve user experience
- Updated Grades icon

name: 1.4.beta2
body:
*Changes to Google Play release 1.3.17*
- Added initial support for showing absences
- Simplified and joint login interface
- Username / password is not stored anymore
- Added icons in settings to improve user experience
- Updated Grades icon

name: 1.3.beta9
body:
*Changes from 1.2.6*
- Support for E-Kréta napló system
- Dropped old KFGNapló support
- Added Timetable function
- Changed colors in the grades windows
- Grades icon can be toggled now
- Smaller fixes, including some visual problems

Google Play release!
*Changes from 1.0.6*
- Grades are grouped by month in table
- "Double" grades are merged into one in the table
- **New substitution system:** Substitutions are more detailed
- Teacher mode: find substitutions based on name instead of class
- Clearer notifications
- Sleep-friendly mode starts at 22:00 ends at 6:00
- Notify user of vendor specific battery optimizations
- Smaller improvements
- Easier to import GYIA link from other apps
- Notification channels
- App targets Android 8.0 now

name: 1.1.beta0
body:
New substitution system:
- detailed view in notifications (room, teacher, ...)
- support for teachers (find substitution based on name)
- simpler notifications

Sleep-friendly mode ends at 6:00

- *Integrated KFG Stand-ins*
- *Uses Evernote/Android-Job*
- *UI improvements*
- *Supports some battery optimization systems*
- *Sleep-friendly mode sends "slient notifications"*
- *Probably full Android Oreo support finally*

name: 1.0.beta2
body:
- Now with KFG Standins
- Uses Android-Job by evernote
- Smaller improvements and fixes
- Experimential Android 8.0 compatibility
- Compatiblity with some battery optimization systems

name: 0.16-RC4
body:
Changes to last stable release (0.14.5)
- *Table to view grades*
- *Offline database for grades w/ all information*
- *Average calculation*
- *Android 8.0 support (under testing)*
- *Fancier 'n' stuff*
- *JobScheduler instead of AlarmManager*

name: 0.14-build3
body:
Changes to the Google Play release *0.10beta*:
- *List view of notes in the notification*
- *Description also shown to grades*
- *GYIA link only appears on click*
- *Some other useful stuff*
- *Fancy green text to help establish proper studying environment*
- *Pointless english translation*
- *Fixes and other serious/important stuff*

name: 0.12beta
body:
Beta version of the possible release 0.12, that probably works fine but not all functions could be tested now

- *GYIA link only appears on click*
